name: The Bad Game
description:
Looking for bad games to play? Well you´ve come to the right place. This is a game I made during a 1 hour challenge I put to myself. The game was completed 20 seconds before the hour ends. This is made with assets from the assets store. I know this is a very bad game, but I wanted to know what I was capable of.

Controls: Move with A,  and D. You can crouch with S and jump with W or SPACE
